name: pixel-ecosystem
description: Master repository for the Pixel ecosystem - AI agents, collaborative art, and Lightning Network integration

scripts.dev: npm run doctor && concurrently "pnpm -F lnpixels dev" "pnpm dev:agent" "pnpm -F pixel-landing dev" "pnpm dev:syntropy"
scripts.test: pnpm -F lnpixels test && pnpm test:agent && pnpm test:syntropy
scripts.build: pnpm -F lnpixels build && pnpm -F pixel-landing build && pnpm -F syntropy-core build && npm run build:agent
scripts.lint: pnpm -F lnpixels lint && pnpm -F pixel-landing lint && pnpm -F syntropy-core lint
scripts.clean: pnpm -F lnpixels clean && pnpm clean:agent && pnpm -F pixel-landing clean && pnpm -F syntropy-core clean
scripts.deploy:setup: mkdir -p logs && pnpm install && pnpm install:agent && pnpm build
scripts.deploy:production: git pull --recurse-submodules && pnpm install && pnpm install:agent && pnpm build && ./scripts/safe-deploy.sh

author: Pixel <pixel@example.com>
